text: Ara tomadera naridera yara rtu sanbandhe hatasbasa hayeche, yadi tomara sandeha kara tahale tadera iddata habe tina masa, ara tadera'o yara rtumati haya ni. Ara garbhabati narira -- tadera samayasima hacche ye tara yena tadera garbha namiye phele. Ara ye ke'u allahâ€Œke bhaya-bhakti kare, tini tara kajakarma tara jan'ya sahaja kare debena.
